column4: ''Parma Eldalamberon'' XI]] (third impression May 2004) says that  ''aikasse'' is the "Quenya form". However, all other entries refer to Qenya.<!-- Also, perhaps, Quenya was a much later conception (Goldogrin manuscript from 1917) --></ref>
